name: claudetainer
description: Opinionated Claude Code workflows via preconfigured hooks and commands

include.description: Comma-separated list of presets to include (python, nodejs, go, shell, etc.)

multiplexer.description: Shell multiplexer for remote sessions (zellij=modern, tmux=traditional, none=simple)

zellij_layout.description: Zellij layout to use: bundled layouts (tablet, phone) or custom path (/path/to/layout.kdl)
